mapper.insert: insert into CartTBL(cartId,custNo, productId, amount ) values (seq_CartTBL.nextval ,#{custNo}, #{productId}, #{amount})
insert into OrderJumunseo(idx,custNo, cartId , productId, productName , amount, orderG ) values (seq_CartTBL.nextval ,#{custNo},#{cartId}, #{productId},#{productName}, #{amount} , #{orderG} )
insert into OrderMoney(idx,custNo, baesongbi , totalmoney ) values (seq_CartTBL.nextval ,#{OcustNo},#{baesongbi}, #{totalmoney} )
mapper.select: select max(idx) idx from orderMoney where CUSTNO =#{OcustNo}
select idx, custNo as custnum, baesongbi, totalmoney, getDate from orderMoney order by idx desc

mapper.delete: update CartTBL set amount=#{amount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select cartId, c.productId, productName, productPrice, amount, productImg as productImgStr from CartTBL c join productTBL p on c.productId = p.productId where custNo= #{custNo}
